CustomField.description: Deprecated in BI Release 2019 - 11 (field moved / added to account as points, not %)
CustomField.formula: IF((BI_Share_12_ME__c <> null || BI_Share_12_ME__c <> 0) && (BI_APM_12_ME__c <> null || BI_APM_12_ME__c <> 0), BI_Share_12_ME__c - BI_APM_12_ME__c, NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto Calculated Formula: Share % (12 ME) - APM % (12 ME)
CustomField.label: xJV Share Premium % (12 ME)
